dcterms:creator: N. Cai
N. Chen
X. Wan
dcterms:description: This dataset contains the occupation times of jump-diffusion processes characterized by double exponential jumps, which are relevant for option pricing.
dcterms:title: Occupation times of jump-diffusion processes

dcterms:creator: D. Landriault
J.-F. Renaud
X. Zhou
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the occupation times of spectrally negative Lévy processes, providing insights into their applications in various fields.
dcterms:title: Occupation times of spectrally negative Lévy processes

dcterms:creator: H. Guérin
J.-F. Renaud
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the distribution of cumulative Parisian ruin, focusing on the impact of exponential delays in the context of insurance mathematics.
dcterms:title: Parisian ruin with exponential delays

dcterms:creator: E.J. Baurdoux
Z. Palmowski
M.R. Pistorius
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates future drawdowns of Lévy processes, providing analytical results relevant for financial risk assessment.
dcterms:title: Future drawdown of Lévy processes

dcterms:creator: H. Guérin
J.-F. Renaud
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the Cramér-Lundberg process with exponential claims, particularly in the context of cumulative Parisian ruin.
dcterms:title: Cramér-Lundberg process with exponential claims

dcterms:creator: A. E. Kyprianou
R. L. Loeffen
dcterms:description: This dataset explores refracted Lévy processes, which are significant in various applications, including insurance and finance.
dcterms:title: Refracted Lévy processes

dcterms:creator: Zhang Hongzhong
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses stochastic drawdowns, providing theoretical results and applications in finance and insurance.
dcterms:title: Drawdown in insurance and finance

dcterms:creator: H. Guérin
J.-F. Renaud
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the inverse occupation time, which is crucial for understanding cumulative Parisian ruin in insurance contexts.
dcterms:title: Inverse occupation time
